items.title: Visa (NYSE:V) Collaborates With Webull For Rapid Fund Transfers Via Visa Direct
items.description: Visa (NYSE:V) recently announced a collaboration with Webull to integrate Visa Direct on their platform, aiming to facilitate faster financial transactions. This news comes amidst Visa's reported 11% price increase over the past month, a notable movement in conjunction with the company's other strategic announcements, such as its robust share buyback program and a new partnership with Rain for stablecoin settlements. While the market waited on the Fed's interest rate decision, Visa's price...
